'''Garden of Jade''' is a [[soundtrack]] from the album ''[[Jadeite Redolence]]''.

This soundtrack is featured as a tune contained within [[Radiant Spincrystal 123]],<!--delete the following if they fix this inconsistency later on--> displayed in the [[Realm Music]] interface under the name '''Jade Court in Chenyu'''.
